thread.title: LeBron out Thursday, may not play again in preseason
thread.title_full: LeBron out Thursday, may not play again in preseason

author: Stunning details in Lamar Odom brothel incident
title: LeBron out Thursday, may not play again in preseason
text:
LeBron out Thursday, may not play again in preseason theScore 2 hrs ago © Frank Victores-USA TODAY Sports The case many have tried to make for shortening the NBA's preseason likely has some fans with the Cleveland Cavaliers .
AdChoices LeBron James sat out Thursday's exhibition matchup with the Indiana Pacers , and Cavs coach David Blatt said it's fully possible that James won't play again this preseason.
"We’ll see what happens at the beginning of next week," Blatt told reporters . "I certainly don't expect him to play both games and I don’t know if he'll even play one. We'll see."
The Cavaliers only have two preseason games left - at the Toronto Raptors on Sunday and home against the Dallas Mavericks on Monday. Because they are meaningless games on a back-to-back, it's implausible James would play in both anyways. The Cavs open the regular season against the Chicago Bulls as part of the season-opening TNT doubleheader on Oct. 27.
James was sent home sick from Tuesday's preseason loss to the Milwaukee Bucks . It's no secret the Cavaliers intend to further regulate his minutes this season after a historic usage rate in last spring's playoffs. He turns 31 in December.
